original_title: Kene Yuxi: As Voltas do Kene
overview: Trying to reverse the abandonment of his people's traditions and based on the research previously conducted by his father, professor and writer Joaquim Man√°, Zezinho Yube registers the knowledge of the traditional weaving made by the Huni Kui women.
title: Kene Yuxi: As Voltas do Kene
